description: Kacricon, along with Jerid Messa and Emma Sheen, is a member of the Titans` initial trio of Gundam Mk.II test pilots. Forced to surrender his Gundam Mk.II during the AEUG`s raid on the Titan headquarters, Kacricon rejoins the battle against the rebels once they reach the moon, serving as a senior partner to the relatively hapless Jerid.
name: Kacricon Cacooler
